title: ImThour
author: ImThour
content: Hi fellow members,I recently got laid off from my professional job where I used to work as a Software Engineer. I am the only one who earns in my family and to feed them good, I am willing to provide my services at a reasonable price.Here are my skillset:Languages: C, C++, Python, JavaScript, PHP, Solidity.Tools: Figma, Photoshop, VEGAS, After Effect.Frameworks: React, VueJS, Svelte.I can make websites, designs, infographics, web scrapers, automated tools and anything you need coded.I can also code in Solidity and can create ERC20 Tokens and ERC71 NFTs.I also have Legendary signature available for rent If you want to hire.Currently going from a difficult phase of my life. I would appreciate any help I get from fellow Bitcoiners. üôèIf anyone feel generous to throw some donations, here you go:BTC - 1Nt6MxvNhHLpbo8AufXCZKqfMTsgQg3GMfSegwit - bc1qukejgdclnqzdds2adw9c0cczhe3ar8gmmftjz7
